long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emaily is an optimized ChatGPT-3 chrome extension for gmail. If a user highlights a piece of text, and right-clicks it, they can ask questions, respond in an email format, check grammar, and add more details; all with just a few buttons while staying on the Gmail page. Overal, Emaily harnesses the power of ChatGPT withought disruptions.
